meanings.definition: A structure for housing a colony of bees.
meanings.sent1: The hive was buzzing with bees collecting nectar.
meanings.sent2: The beekeeper checked on the hive to ensure the bees were healthy.
meanings.sent3: The hive seemed like a tiny city full of busy workers.
meanings.sent4: The hive of bees was a bustling community of tiny residents.
meanings.sent5: The hive hummed with the sound of countless wings in motion.

meanings.sent1: The marketplace was a hive of vendors selling their goods.
meanings.sent2: The school cafeteria was a hive of students chatting and eating.
meanings.sent3: The office was a hive of employees typing away on their computers.
meanings.sent4: The park was a hive of children playing and laughing.
meanings.sent5: The concert hall was a hive of music lovers enjoying the performance.

meanings.definition: To store or gather in a hive.
meanings.sent1: She would hive away her favorite snacks in a secret drawer.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel would hive nuts in preparation for winter.
meanings.sent3: He would hive his collection of stamps in an old shoebox.
meanings.sent4: The ant would hive food in its underground tunnels.
meanings.sent5: They would hive memories of their adventures in a special album.
